response.overview: From her bedroom window, Alice (Lulu Chu) spots her new neighbor changing in his house. She recognizes him as her former college professor, Mr. Philips (Charles Dera), and spies on him, growing so aroused by him that she decides to masturbate. When she climaxes, however, she sees that he's spotted her, so she frantically closes the blinds.  The next day, Alice looks out the window again and sees that he's been waiting for her. From his window, Mr. Philips motions for her to strip for him. Alice does so, giving him a striptease until he cums, after which he lets her take a photo of him as a souvenir. Wanting to up the ante, Alice tapes the photo of Mr. Philips to his front door, along with the words 'surprise me' and a key to her house.  A few days later, Alice gets what she asked for...
response.title: Surprise Me
